notes: When a [[Glooth-Generator]] becomes fully charged, it releases 4 Energy Pulses in the room which then destroy the [[Glooth-Generator]] and seriously damages anyone within range. Technically, it does not destroy the [[Glooth-Generator]], rather the generator despawns itself, or the other [[Glooth-Generator]]s would be destroyed also.
name: Energy Pulse
behaviour: Explodes, consuming itself and severely damaging anyone in range.
location: [[Jaccus Maxxen's Dungeon]] - final boss room when spawned by [[Glooth-Generator]]s.
strategy: Stay away from it, or even better, destroy the [[Glooth-Generator]]s before they can spawn.
